name: Burning Horizon
description:
Burning Horizon was made for the 2020 Global Game Jam for the theme "Repair" You are playing an astronaut on the Horizon space station during a meteor storm. Try and fix oxygen leaks and put out fires before the entire station runs out of air and you die.

WASD to move, Click to open and close doors or to fix things.

Kevin Bryan - Level Design, Shaders
Justin Camelia - Programming
Aaron Jones - Particle Effects
Trent Moriarty - Music
David Sharer - Programming
Cody Stamm - Environment Design
Megan Taylor - Character Art, UI
